name: Inspectrals
description:
Inspectrals was intended to be  a game where you can dive into graves and use them to teleport  around a maze of lights in a graveyard to turn them off.

You can move with the arrow keys, dive/dash with Z, and you can see the unused death animation with X.

This is my first Game Jam, my first time using Godot and GDScript, and my first time making a game outside of Scratch.

I didn't even come close to finishing, and I am not very proud of my project. However, I can't deny that I learned a lot by doing it, and I wanted to put this out there so I can look back at it when I've improved in the future.

3 Days is not a lot of time to make a game, but to make a game, learn an engine and a language? Yeah, I overreached a bit. X)
